comments.body: Does the package version need to be updated (line 1)?

No, the package hasn't been updated.
Although, I am confused since the original package is in version 0.30 and this type definition says it is for v0.31

Weird. https://github.com/yagop/node-telegram-bot-api/pull/752.

So, it looks like the changes you’ve made here exist on GitHub, but not yet on npm, but maybe will be published soon. But that means there _is_ a version mismatch here—I think you need to bump the version to 0.40, and maybe we should wait until the actual library gets published.
